name: Verify Manager cannot change Manager role to Admin
description:
- Login with valid credentials.
- Create new organization via **API**.
- Signup `second user`.
- Invite `second user` to organization with `Manager` role via **API**.
- Signup `third user`.
- Invite `third user` to organization with `Manager` role via **API**.

### Verify that:

- `Manager` cannot change user role from `Manager` to `Admin`.
descriptionHtml:
• Login with valid credentials.
  • Create new organization via API.
  • Signup second user.
  • Invite second user to organization with Manager role via API.
  • Signup third user.
  • Invite third user to organization with Manager role via API.

Verify that:

  • Manager cannot change user role from Manager to Admin.

- Invite `second user` to organization with `Manager` role via **API**.
- Signup `third user`.

testStage.descriptionHtml:
• Login with valid credentials.
  • Create new organization via API.
  • Signup second user.
  • Invite second user to organization with Manager role via API.
  • Signup third user.
  • Invite third user to organization with Manager role via API.

Verify that:

  • Manager cannot change user role from Manager to Admin.
